If AIG, whose reckless behavior resulted in a$ 182 billion taxpayer bailout, prefers to do business in Republican states, then the next time they go bankrupt, I hope they don't ask taxpayers in Vermont and other Democratic-leaning states for another bailout, Senator Bernie Sanders , a Vermont independent, said today.-- With assistance from John Gittelsohn and Noah Buhayar in New York.
